definitions.definition: At an angle to the horizontal ; slanted or sloped .
examples: The take-off ramp was inclined at 20 degrees.

definitions.definition: Having a tendency , preference , likelihood , or disposition .
examples: I am inclined to believe you.
She's inclined to lose her temper.

main_definition: At an angle to the horizontal ; slanted or sloped .
secondary_definitions: Having a tendency , preference , likelihood , or disposition .
